title: Analysis UPDATE DOT/USDT in 4Hour üé≤
name: arztoday
contents:
As we discussed in the previous analysis of Cryptocurrency, we said that with the loss of the support area of $6.50, the price will reach the daily support of $6.00. If this $6 support area is lost, the price is expected to react to the $5.5 support level . Otherwise, by stabilizing the price above 6.8 dollars, it has the ability to reach 7.2 dollars and 750 dollars.

Arztoday Teamüåà

title: Supply of Houses is at Crash Levels!
name: Skipper86
contents: This idea is explained on the chart because that‚Äôs the easiest way to explain it. If you start at the green ‚ÄúStart Here‚Äù star in the top right corner and follow the green arrows, my observations about the current market conditions and how they compare to previous market crash conditions are detailed. Please feel free to ask questions.
comments:
[{"id":9230987,"parent_id":null,"root_id":9230987,"comment":"Housing is primarily measured in volume throughput, not pricing. While time on the market may be a decent proxy in typical conditions, it doesn't necessarily indicate that the market is over supplied based on current market dynamics. The fundamental question is "are the conditions we see today reflective of the same conditions found in 2008" and my response would be "no".

The avtive listing count (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/ACTLISCOUUS) indicates that throughput currently is 1/2 of Jan 2017 throughput. Demand for housing, even at current levels is effectively double that of 2017 due to scarcity alone. This cannot acount for homeowners refinancing sub 4% and not being interested in buying a new home at this point. if we account for that over time, I would expect there to be even fewer homes going onto the market.

Household debt payments (Credit Cards) as a fraction of income is near historic lows (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/TDSP) which would indicate there is capacity for individuals to assume more debt if they wish as indicated in the debt load from (https://fredblog.stlouisfed.org/2019/10/households-lightening-debt-load/?utm_source=series_page&utm_medium=related_content&utm_term=related_resources&utm_campaign=fredblog) this blog post. From this you can argue there is a capacity for potential homeowners to increase financing. That said, increased interest rates have decreased affordability by 30%.

On top of this, the number of existing single family homes sold has dropped 20% as a result of increased rates. We can also make the same assumption that people will not put their house on the market if they are going to get a worse deal on putchasing a new home, so you should see a similar decrease in the active listing count over time. 

So I see a 50% reduction in supply vs a 20% impact in demand and a 30% reduction in financing ability leaves you at roughly neutral demand levels. title: Theta Fuel (TFUEL) - Bearish divergence
name: without_worries
contents:
The probability of further upside following a massive 86,000% return since last March and multiple overbought conditions has reached a limit. The risk / reward now favours sellers.

Why bearish? On the above 4-day chart:

1) Price action has broken the 21-week EMA (yellow line) with a full bodied candle. Price action has also failed to confirm the ascending triangle pattern with a breakout to the underside.

2) Bearish divergence between price action and the oscillators. See 2-week chart below.

3) RSI support has failed with RSI now <50 = very bearish .

4) Astonishingly 96% of tradingview ideas are long counting the first 50 recently published. 90% of traders out there will lose money. Don‚Äôt be the 90.

5) Bearish engulfing candle recently printed on 2-week - remember this is a 2-week chart, very powerful.

A short entry from 38 cents is amazing.

Trade is void with price action holding 45 cents > 1-week.

Target? 3 cents.

WW

Comment: Expecting a rally to 34-45 cents area. Watch it closely, does it become support? Trade void.

Does it become resistance? Get a life jacket.
Comment: Should expect a rally to the 30 cents area following the buy signal.

Trade closed: target reached: Target reached -90% later.

No indication of a trend reversal at this time.

title: Holders & buyers are in for a rough ride
name: LUC_Capital
contents: The crypto market has been shaken up by macros like it has been over and over again. BTC has strayed far below its 10 & 20 SMA . Long-term logarithmic support is at $27000, and we are not even in the $20,000s. Volume has dropped off. Will next week's macro news bring new lows? SPX is at major support and a bounce is possible, however DJI has made new lows, and a test for resistance would probably not hold. Based on these technical indicators, I think it's likely we are heading to new lows.

title: ZKSpace (ZKS) - 100x opportunity
name: without_worries
contents:
Imagine this, $1000 becoming $100k. Impossible? Someone might have said the same thing in reverse last February with a $100k @ $10 and now they're stuck with $1k. Ironically, they're probably a seller today.

On the above 2-day chart price action has collapsed a massive 99% over the last 12 months. Now is an excellent time to be bullish . Why?

1) The ‚Äòincredible buy‚Äô signal prints on both dollar (left) and BTC pairs. Remember this s a 2-day chart.

2) Regular bullish divergence on both dollar and BTC pairs.

3) Lastly on the 3-week chart both pairs print a morning star candle (below). I made a tutorial a while back on the importance of those reversal signals. If you don't know what I'm talking about, just ask..

Is it possible price action falls further? Really? You‚Äôre asking that after a 99% collapse? :)

Is it probable? Very unlikely.

Good luck!

Ww

name: vanquisher27
contents: Week 3 of September was exciting... The yen was able to hold down a VERY strong USD while both currencies absolutely OBLITERATED any and everything in its path. I have over 600 running pips in Gbpjpy with no bottom in sight and quickly banked almost 500 pips on Eurjpy . Could this be it?

title: SPY - Update (From Nov. 2021)
name: jacobosiason7
contents:
Posting an update on the SPY here as the markets closed out the week in somewhat of a make or break spot. The SPY continued to follow the bearish megaphone that it's been holding for months, while simultaneously holding the downtrend stemming from a massive head and shoulders on the SPY's weekly timeframe (See Attached Charts Below). A bearish bat harmonic pattern also formed on the SPY on Friday, as it broke below a strong support level circa $368.27 and closed near its 52-Week low at $362.17. This comes as seller volume continues to outweigh buyer volume as the markets head into a big week economically speaking. In the upcoming week, economic data and events include New Home Sales, Consumer Confidence, International Trade Numbers, Jobless Claims, and to cap off the week, GDP Numbers as well. Treading lightly here, some RSI-based supply and demand zones to keep an eye on in the interim, bearish and hedged-
--Previous Charts Attached Below--

Weekly TimeFrame

title: S&P500 ‚Äì not the bear market, just a correction!
name: SkyrexTrading
contents:
Hello, everyone!

You know me as a Bitcoin analyst, but S&P500 have the strong influence on cryptomarket. Today I revealed that the ‚Äúbear market‚Äù on traditional markets is going to end.

I use quotes because it is not the true bear market, just the correction. I will explain you why. What is the bear market ‚Äì it‚Äôs the 5 waves Elliott cycle to the downside, but if we try to count waves the potential wave 4 overlaps the wave 1 ‚Äì it means that it‚Äôs not the waves 1 and 4. Thus we have to consider it as the ABC correction. Here this ABC is represented as a zigzag . Wave A consists of the zigzag abc inside it. The same is true for wave B. Now the price continues to draw the wave C. The target for wave C could be the 0.618 Fibonacci extension ($3550). Also the MACD indicator on the 1W timeframe showing us the potential strong bullish divergence ‚Äì it‚Äôs the insane reversal signal for the end of the ‚Äúbear market‚Äù.
Comment: The Bitcoin will follow the traditional markets and my last analysis on BTCUSDT confirms my thoughts on SPX:
Comment: Best regards, Ivan

title: Bitcoin! He found support on the old support! Update 1.0
name: seba26-77
contents:
Hallo traders, I'm posting a small update of my post from June 2022
After three months, the price dropped back to the old support which was a determinant in the earlier years, which is easy to see the real price was higher than the price in June, yet a double bottom has formed on this support. This
Taking the double bottom curve into account, it seems that the price should return to the $ 60k range by July 2023. It may also say that 4 years of support may give us direction for the future.
Lines of strong resistance are marked on the chart.

Best regards and good luck
Comment:
Comment: We slowly move up
